# ConvertFrom-MCDProductsXml

Source: `source/Private/OperatingSystem/ConvertFrom-MCDProductsXml.ps1`

## Synopsis

Converts a Microsoft products.xml into normalized ESD catalog items.

## Description

Parses an MCT products.xml (typically extracted from a Microsoft fwlink CAB)
and returns a deterministic, normalized set of items representing downloadable
Windows ESD entries.

## Parameters

| Name | Type | Mandatory | Pipeline | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| ProductsXml | XmlDocument | Yes | No | The products.xml loaded as an [xml] object. |
| SourceFwlinkId | String | Yes | No | The fwlink id used to obtain the CAB that contained this products.xml. |
| ClientTypes | String[] | No | No | Client type filters that must appear in the FilePath (e.g. CLIENTCONSUMER, CLIENTBUSINESS). Use both to build a combined catalog. |
| IncludeUrl | SwitchParameter | No | No | Includes the FilePath (direct download URL) in returned items. |
| IncludeKey | SwitchParameter | No | No | Includes the Key field from products.xml if present. |

## Examples

### Example 1

```powershell
[xml]$x = Get-Content -Path .\products.xml -Raw
ConvertFrom-MCDProductsXml -ProductsXml $x -SourceFwlinkId 2156292 -ClientTypes @('CLIENTCONSUMER','CLIENTBUSINESS')
```
